about_the_game:
The Holy Grail, a divine artifact that the land of Erodrad was blessed with, has gone missing. With the Grail gone, Power will flow out of control, and Erodrad's future will grow bleak. God commands the angel Elu to descend from heaven and seek the Grail. Her journey begins in Benedicta Town...

Can Elu find the Holy Grail in time, or will the world fall to ruin as Power overflows? Who is behind the disappearance of the Holy Grail?

Only you can see Elu's story through to the end!


Explore God's miniature garden in search of the Holy Grail. Be careful, though! The enemies in areas of interest are corrupted by overflowing Power, making them incredibly violent. Use Elu's miracles to protect yourself in this exploration-based RPG!

The mayor of Benedicta Town and the parish priest will help you along in your journey. The mayor has many leads and avenues for investigation and will help you every step of the way. The priest isn't so nice.

Your actions during Elu's journey and the amount of Power she absorbs will lead you to different endings. Try your best to find them all!






Exploration-based RPG
The land of Erodrad is vast and has plenty to see—though that makes finding the Holy Grail a difficult task indeed. Every area you take on has a unique vibe and different enemies to face.

Quests
While waiting for the mayor to gather new leads on the whereabouts of the Holy Grail, you can help the citizens of Benedicta Town—for a reward, of course! There's plenty of people in need of help and plenty to see...

Class System
As you level up, you may be upgraded to a new class. Each class has its own advantages, but keep an eye on your Power Gauge! There are some classes that can only be obtained at a certain level of Power...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: All was peaceful in God's miniature garden, Erodrad, until the day the Holy Grail went missing. It's up to the angel Elu to retrieve the sacred artifact and restore order to the world.
